description: Fully PFC-free, featured for versatility and focused on mobility, the Powder Town Pants have an H2No® Performance Standard 2-layer shell for waterproof/breathable and windproof protection, an articulated fit for freedom of movement, and a smooth liner for comfort and easy layering. Inseam is 32.5 in.
name: Patagonia Powder Town Pants, Reg - Mens
